name: K Station
description:
> WHAT IS GOING ON?!
It's New Year's Day, 2319, and the happy denizens of K Station are disappearing one at a time. That's all you know.> WHO AM I?
You are Maya, a lab assistant and government employee working on K Station. You're hung over from the New Year's Eve party, cranky, street-smart, and a little tired.> WHAT SHOULD I DO??
Find a way out. Get help. Get to know your colleagues as their lives transform, one missing coworker at a time.

K Station is an adventure game where the world and story are collapsing, room by room and life by life. Discover new lives, new hopes, new dreams and new disappointments -- all from the friends and coworkers you thought you knew.> HOW DOES IT END?
Logically.
